subject: Pedals configuration
description_text:
Hi!

I have already received the pedals, but the Simsonn Manager software does not recognize them. I connected the pedals to the box, and the box to the PC. When I make the connection, I hear a sound on the PC, so it recognizes that something has been connected; however, they are disconnected in the app.

What can I do to resolve the situation?

[cid:f910fe23-6eaf-4de3-9d6d-f7588c881f64]

Thanks,
Diogo Pereira

conversations.body_text: Hi Diogo Pereira,  Please download VKB Joy Tester and check if it can detect the SIMSONN device. Kindly send me a screenshot so I can verify whether the device information is correct.      https://www.vkbcontrollers.com/pages/downloads

Hi!

VKB tester recognized the both pedals.
There is the screenshot.

[cid:d4240734-84e9-405e-af97-c23ab9f6b596]

Thanks,
Diogo Pereira
